name: Jonathan Steele
title: Jonathan Steele | Software Engineer
about: Experienced software engineer who builds scalable, high-performance apps using Kotlin, Swift, Flutter, and .NET MAUI. I believe in shipping clean, reliable code and crafting seamless user experiences through thoughtful, innovative engineering. I'm passionate about problem-solving and committed to continuous learning, always working to stay current with the latest technologies. I thrive in agile environments and value effective team collaboration to deliver impactful solutions.
